item.title: How to Crack the FNMT Certificate?
item.description: So I recovered the password of my FNMT digital certificate in Linux by programming a tool to avoid the tedious process of requesting a new one.

item.title: The perils of Python: How to program a KeyLogger
item.description: Explores the risks of Python by detailing how to create a KeyLogger, highlighting its threat to personal privacy and security by covertly capturing keystrokes.

item.title: This is how I create a Simple PHP Web Shell
item.description: I always use the Pentest Monkey reverse shell when uploading php files when playing ctfs. So, for a change, I came up with the idea of programming my own PHP Web Shell.
